title: Textile, 1680–90
medium:
Medium: silk, metal thread
Technique: damasse brocaded
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 73 x 53 cm (28 3/4 x 20 7/8 in.)
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of W. & J. Sloane
description: A rich red approaching brown with silver. The first stripe has flat clearly drawn leaves and flowers in a pattern that receeds and interlockingscrolls in silver. The second stripe is a ribbon with decorative edges.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1680–90.
1680–90. Medium: silk, metal thread
Technique: damasse brocaded. Museum purchase through gift of W. & J. Sloane. 1995-7-1.
